Dual navigation system (Boards overview + Roadmap detail view)

flow.userIntent: Explore product feedback, feature requests, and development roadmap; understand what's planned vs. in progress vs. complete

exitPoints: Click specific board card to filter
Click individual feature request to view details

interactiveElements.action: Filter roadmap by category (Feature Requests, Bug Reports, etc.)
Visual status grouping; likely clickable for more detail
Expand to show details or navigate to full view

flow.informationArchitecture: Two-level hierarchy: Boards overview (aggregate by category) → Roadmap detail (filtered by status); each feature shows vote count, category tag, and brief description
frictionPoints: Requires account to likely submit feedback or vote
Multiple navigation layers (boards vs. roadmap) may confuse some users
progressIndicators: Kanban status columns (Planned, In Progress, Complete)
Vote counts on each feature request card
